verses.roman:
brāhmaṇere kahe,--"tumi yāha nija-ghara
ethāya rahiba āmi, nā yāba ataḥpara"

synonyms: brāhmaṇere kahe—He asked the brāhmaṇa; tumi—you; yāha—go; nija-ghara—to your own home; ethāya—here in this place; rahiba—shall stay; āmi—I; nā—not; yāba—shall go; ataḥpara—hereafter.
translation: The Lord told the brāhmaṇa, "Now you can go home. I shall stay here and shall not leave."
